snippet: The Federal Reserve says it expects to collect $440 million in fees from 70 big banks and other financial firms to help cover its costs of supervising them.
abstract: Federal Reserve says it expects to collect $440 million in fees from 70 big banks and other financial firms to help cover costs of expanding regulation.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve says it expects to collect $440 million in fees from 70 big banks and other financial firms to help cover its costs of supervising them.

headline.main: Fed Says It Will Collect $440 Million in Fees From Banks
headline.print_headline: Fed Says It Will Collect $440 Million In Fees From Banks
